Pre-Game Insights: The New York Knicks are 17-8 in Eastern Conference games and have a 9-6 record against opponents over.500.
The Orlando Magic are 17-10 in Eastern Conference play and have struggled in games decided by less than 4 points.
The Knicks average 13.6 made 3-pointers per game, while the Magic give up 11.3, a significant difference.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Karl-Anthony Towns is averaging 25.3 points, 14 rebounds, and 3.4 assists for the Knicks.
Jalen Suggs is scoring 16.4 points per game and averaging 4.1 rebounds for the Magic.
The Knicks are averaging 121.5 points, 46.0 rebounds, 28.1 assists, 8.7 steals, and 2.8 blocks per game, while shooting 50.2% from the field.
The Magic are averaging 98.8 points, 39.7 rebounds, 23.8 assists, 9.2 steals, and 6.3 blocks per game, shooting 42.8% from the field.

Injuries: Knicks - Karl-Anthony Towns (day to day - hamstring), Miles McBride (day to day - hamstring), Mitchell Robinson (out - ankle), Jalen Brunson (day to day - calf). Magic - Gary Harris (out - hamstring), Paolo Banchero (out - oblique), Jalen Suggs (out - back), Franz Wagner (out - oblique), Moritz Wagner (out for season - knee).
